image_prompt: Dynamic pixel art scene of the cute chubby bee mascot wearing large retro headphones, DJing on a glowing 8-bit mixing deck. Sound waves visible as chunky lime green (#ecf874) and pastel mint bars pulsating in the background. High energy, warm lighting, cozy 'Stardew Valley' aesthetic but with a party vibe.
